String.string: Find {@LinkCreature:63#6001#Launa} on a pillar near Valkyon Federation Headquarters.
Collect the {@LinkCreature:63#6002#First Essence} floating above Freedom Plaza.
Collect the {@LinkCreature:63#6003#Second Essence} floating above Freedom Plaza.
Collect the {@LinkCreature:63#6004#Third Essence} floating above Freedom Plaza.
Collect the {@LinkCreature:63#6005#Fourth Essence} floating above Freedom Plaza.
Collect the {@LinkCreature:63#6006#Fifth Essence} floating above Freedom Plaza.
Return to {@LinkCreature:63#6001#Launa} on the pillar near Valkyon Federation Headquarters.

Interact with flying objects 100 times in Guardian Legion flight missions.
[Use key to open the world map and activate Guardian mode. Press the blue shield icon to join a Guardian Legion flight mission.]
Receive reward from {@LinkCreature:63#6001#Launa} on the pillar near Valkyon Federation Headquarters.
